name: PKP.GitHub.io
tagline: Source code resources for Public Knowledge Project software
body:
### PKP Code Resources
Welcome! [The Public Knowledge Project](http://pkp.sfu.ca) maintains [Open Journal Systems](http://pkp.sfu.ca/ojs), [Open Monograph Press](http://pkp.sfu.ca/omp), [Open Conference Systems](http://pkp.sfu.ca/ocs), and more. Here you'll find a list of code repositories you can download, modify, and contribute to.

### Application Code Repositories
- [Open Journal Systems](https://github.com/pkp/ojs)
- [Open Monograph Press](https://github.com/pkp/omp)
- [Open Conference Systems](https://github.com/pkp/ocs)
- [Open Harvester Systems](https://github.com/pkp/harvester)

Our applications make use of a shared library called the [PKP Web Application Library](https://github.com/pkp/pkp-lib/).

### Other Projects
- [XML Parsing Service](https://github.com/pkp/xmlps): An automatic XML parsing service to convert scholarly documents into JATS XML

### Tools
- [OJS Stats](https://github.com/pkp/ojsstats): Crunch statistics about OJS usage.
- [Vagrant Images](https://github.com/pkp/vagrant): Vagrant configurations for VM-based installations of PKP software.
- [Scholarly Bot List](https://github.com/pkp/scholarly-bot-list): A list of user agents that should be considered robots when tracking readership statistics.

### Documentation
- [OMP User Guide](https://github.com/pkp/omp-user-guide) 

### Plugins
- [PDF.js Viewer](https://github.com/pkp/pdfJsViewer): Deliver PDFs in OJS using the PDF.js reader.
- [Custom Block Manager](https://github.com/pkp/customBlockManager): Create custom sidebar blocks through the web interface.
- [Static Pages](https://github.com/pkp/staticPages): Create custom static pages through the web interface.
- [TinyMCE](https://github.com/pkp/tinymce): Add support for rich text editing to PKP applications with TinyMCE.
- [Email Logger](https://github.com/pkp/emailLogger): Log emails in the database for auditing and testing.
- [Translator](https://github.com/pkp/translator): Edit translations directly from within PKP applications.
- [OJS Markup](https://github.com/pkp/ojs-markup): Integrate the XML Parsing Service into OJS for automatic conversion of scholarly documents into JATS XML.
- [Default Translation](https://github.com/pkp/defaultTranslation): Use English-language text when translations are missing.
- [ALM](https://github.com/pkp/ALM): Present Article-Level Metrics for published content in OJS.

### More Information
See [For Developers](https://pkp.sfu.ca/developers/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
